alert.note: Alert for Clarendon; Lee; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 12:28AM EDT until June 27 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Lee County in central South Carolina... Northeastern Clarendon County in central South Carolina... Sumter County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Richland County in central South Carolina... * Until 115 AM EDT. * At 1228 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Shaw Air Base, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Sumter, South Sumter, Shaw Air Base, Alcolu, Oakland, Woods Bay State Park, Elliott, Mulberry, Sumter County Airport, Millwood, Turbeville, Mayesville, Lynchburg, Cane Savannah, Dalzell, Brogdon, Wedgewood, Cherryvale, Stateburg and Woodrow. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 121 and 146. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
